summary: Specializing in SAP Hybris and Java for global e-commerce solutions.
highlights: Specialized in SAP Hybris Commerce and Java, contributing to the development and maintenance of a large-scale global e-commerce platform supporting 45+countries.
Managing incident resolution and root cause analysis to ensure high availability, stability, and seamless customer experience across international markets.

summary: Built Flask microservices and APIs to optimize healthcare workflows.
highlights: Designed and deployed Flask-based microservices for centralized medicine management, enabling seamless data exchange across legacy and modern APIs.
Created robust REST APIs for HIMS and pharmacy operations accelerated reporting and automated key workflows, reducing processing times by 30%.
Implemented secure authentication protocols JWT, modernized front-end modules using React, and streamlined state management zustand, tailwind CSS.
